verses.verse: A good <S%H8034>name<s%> is rather to be <S%H977>chosen<s%> than <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4480>riches,<s%> <S%H6239><s%> and <S%H2896>loving<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> rather than <S%H4480>silver<s%> <S%H3701><s%> and <S%H4480>gold.<s%> <S%H2091><s%>
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> and <S%H7326>poor<s%> meet <S%H6298>together:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H6213>maker<s%> of them <S%H3605>all.<s%>
A <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H7200>foreseeth<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and hideth <S%H5641>himself:<s%> but the <S%H6612>simple<s%> pass <S%H5674>on,<s%> and are <S%H6064>punished.<s%>
By <S%H6118><s%> <S%H6038>humility<s%> and the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and <S%H3519>honor,<s%> and <S%H2416>life.<s%>

Thorns <S%H6791><s%> and <S%H6341>snares<s%> are in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6141>froward:<s%> he that doth <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them.

Train <S%H2596>up<s%> a <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> he should <S%H6310>go:<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H2204>old,<s%> he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it.
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> over the <S%H7326>poor,<s%> and the <S%H3867>borrower<s%> is <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H376>lender.<s%> <S%H3867><s%>
He that <S%H2232>soweth<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H205>vanity:<s%> and the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5678>anger<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail.<s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> that hath a <S%H2896>bountiful<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> of his <S%H4480>bread<s%> <S%H3899><s%> to the <S%H1800>poor.<s%>
Cast <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H3887>scorner,<s%> and <S%H4066>contention<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out;<s%> yea, <S%H1779>strife<s%> and <S%H7036>reproach<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease.<s%>
He that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H2890>pureness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> for the <S%H2580>grace<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be his <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and he <S%H5557>overthroweth<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H898>transgressor.<s%>
The <S%H6102>slothful<s%> man <S%H559>saith,<s%> There is a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2351>without,<s%> I shall be <S%H7523>slain<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H7339>streets.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of strange <S%H2114>women<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>pit:<s%> he that is <S%H2194>abhorred<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H8033>therein.<s%>

Foolishness <S%H200><s%> is <S%H7194>bound<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H5288>child;<s%> but the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H4148>correction<s%> shall drive it <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him.

He that <S%H6231>oppresseth<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> to <S%H7235>increase<s%> his riches, and he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> to the <S%H6223>rich,<s%> shall <S%H389>surely<s%> come to <S%H4270>want.<s%>
Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> thine <S%H241>ear,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and <S%H7896>apply<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto my <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it is a <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> thing <S%H3588>if<s%> thou <S%H8104>keep<s%> them <S%H990>within<s%> thee; they shall <S%H3162>withal<s%> be <S%H3559>fitted<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> thy <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
That thy <S%H4009>trust<s%> may <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have made <S%H3045>known<s%> to thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H637>even<s%> to <S%H859>thee.<s%>
Have <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H3789>written<s%> to thee excellent <S%H7991>things<s%> in <S%H4156>counsels<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%>

That I might make thee <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H7189>certainty<s%> of the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth;<s%> that thou mightest <S%H7725>answer<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> to them that <S%H7971>send<s%> unto thee?

Rob <S%H1497><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H1800>poor:<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1792>oppress<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> in the gate: <S%H8179><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7378>plead<s%> their <S%H7379>cause,<s%> and <S%H6906>spoil<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> those that <S%H6906>spoiled<s%> them.

Make <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H7462>friendship<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> an <S%H639>angry<s%> <S%H1167>man;<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> a <S%H2534>furious<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go: <S%H935><s%>
Lest <S%H6435><s%> thou <S%H502>learn<s%> his <S%H734>ways,<s%> and <S%H3947>get<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to thy <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou one of them that <S%H8628>strike<s%> <S%H3709>hands,<s%> or of them that are <S%H6148>sureties<s%> for <S%H4859>debts.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> thou hast <S%H369>nothing<s%> to <S%H7999>pay,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> should he take <S%H3947>away<s%> thy <S%H4904>bed<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> thee?
Remove <S%H5253><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1366>landmark,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H6213>set.<s%>

Seest <S%H2372><s%> thou a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4106>diligent<s%> in his <S%H4399>business?<s%> he shall <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings;<s%> he shall <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2823>mean<s%> men.
